mapper.select: SELECT s.series_name AS series_name, u.series_id AS series_id, s.series_images AS series_images, COUNT(1) AS nums FROM star_nft_user_theme u LEFT JOIN star_nft_series s ON u.series_id = s.id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId} AND u.`status` = #{status} AND u.source = #{themeType} AND u.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY u.series_id

SELECT t.theme_name AS theme_name, n.id AS number_id, n.theme_number AS theme_number, u.series_theme_info_id AS theme_id, u.pre_tax_price AS price, t.theme_pic AS theme_images FROM star_nft_user_theme u, star_nft_theme_info t, star_nft_theme_number n WHERE u.series_theme_info_id = t.id AND u.series_theme_id = n.id AND u.user_id = #{userId} AND u.`status` = #{status} AND u.source = #{themeType} AND u.series_theme_info_id = #{themeId} AND u.is_delete = 0
